titleStmt.title: An addition to the Clavis aurea with an enquiry upon what terms the salvation of man doth depend; whether entirely on faith or entirely on works, or whether entirely on grace or free-gift. By Thomas Moor, author of the Clavis aurea, living in St. Thomas's in Southwark.
Clavis aurea. Addition.
titleStmt.author: Moor, Thomas, fl. 1695-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: [This book may be had at Thomas Moor's, a barber, living in St. Thomas's in Southwark, near the sign of the Harrow],

notesStmt.note: Bookseller's name and address from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.

place.placeName: Thomas Moor's, a barber, living in St. Thomas's in Southwark, near the sign of the Harrow]
